input_text.Prompt:
Cisco and Salesforce are partnering to align collaboration, Internet of Things, and contact center technologies.

Specifically, the two companies will jointly develop and market products that combine Cisco's Spark and WebEx into Salesforce's Sales and Service Clouds. The integration will integrate chat, video, and voice features.

More importantly, Cisco's Jasper IoT platform will integrate with Salesforce's IoT cloud. The combination should give Salesforce's Einstein artificial intelligence platform more data and visibility. See: Salesforce's Einstein AI platform: What you need to know

The partnership with Salesforce complements Cisco's IoT and collaboration deals with IBM.

Salesforce's IoT Cloud tracks customer actions while Cisco's Jasper platform targets more back-end enterprise assets.

On the customer service front, Salesforce's Service Cloud will integrate with Cisco's Unified Contact Center Enterprise systems.

The collaboration integration between Salesforce and Cisco will be available in the second half of 2017. Customers will need licenses from both Salesforce and Cisco Spark or WebEx. IoT integrations will also be available in the second half of 2017 with contact center and service combinations ready now.

Generate a summary:
input_text.Response A: Salesforce and Cisco have announced plans to partner to develop products that combine the companies' collaboration, Internet of Things (IoT), and contact centre technologies. The companies will jointly develop and market products that combine Cisco Spark and WebEx with Salesforce's Sales and Service Clouds. The collaboration integration will offer customers chat, video, and voice features. Cisco's Jasper IoT platform will also integrate with Salesforce's IoT cloud, providing the Einstein artificial intelligence platform with more data and visibility. The partnership with Salesforce complements Cisco's IoT and collaboration deals with IBM.
input_text.Response B:
Sure! Here is the summary of the text requested, written in short words and simple language, as if I were talking to a child:

Cisco and Salesforce are partnering! They will make cool things to help businesses talk to their customers better. They will use Cisco's Spark and WebEx to talk to customers. They will use Salesforce's Einstein to learn more about customers. They will also use Cisco's Jasper to help back-end things work better. The new things will be ready in the second half of 2017. Customers will need licenses from both Cisco and Salesforce.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
